title: The Virginity Mission
description: It’s lust at first sight when Mac sees Jason shirtless and sweating on the back of a truck.Jason is the army sergeant assigned to support the six‐week scientific expedition that Mac isparticipating in, and might just be the perfect candidate for another journey of discoverythat Mac is desperate to undertake — sex.Fraternisation between students and staff might be strictly prohibited, but everybody knowsfruit always tastes better when it’s forbidden.
author: Cate Ellink
